 Trinity/Nightlight:::
Trinity giggled and ran behind Aquataur, trying to reach her.
Nightlight nodded and follow Aerotaur
  Rudra656@... wrote: OOC: It should be noted that if they turn traitor again, then I will be forced to try and kill any characters belonging to Orchid that ever come near their base. 

::Aerotaur/Aquataur:: 
      Aquataur gets up and runs around after Trinity very slowly.  She finally puts on a short burst of speed.  "Tag."  She puts a hand on Trinity's shoulder.  "You're it." 

      Aerotaur nods to Nightlight.  "I stopped liking strangers who come to 'join us' after the second or third group turned traitor and tried to kill us.  Well, we should go meet them anyway."  He sighs and walks out the door to meet the newcomers.
